    {"name":"ci",              "type":["null","string"], "default": null}
  ]

properties.SQL Query:
SELECT
    application_id AS ralis_application_id,
    ra.application_no,
    ra.category_info,
    CASE WHEN status LIKE '%|%' THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(status, '|', 1) ELSE status END AS status,
    ra.`date` ,
    ra.deleted,
    ra.naeb_application,
    ru.role_id as ralis_users_id,
    ru.names as ralis_users_names,
    ru.email as ralis_users_email,
    ru.password as ralis_users_password,
    ru.role_info as ralis_users_role_info,
    ru.checkpoint as ralis_users_checkpoint,
    ru.`date` as ralis_users_date,
    CASE WHEN ru.deleted = 1 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS ralis_users_deleted,
    rc.category_id as ralis_categories_id,
    rc.name as ralis_categories_name,
    rc.parameters as ralis_categories_parameters,
    rc.`type` as ralis_categories_type,
    CASE WHEN ra.deleted = 1 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS ralis_categories_deleted,
    rp.process_id as ralis_processes_id,
    rp.name as ralis_processes_name,
    rp.parameters as ralis_processes_parameters,
    CASE WHEN rp.deleted = 1 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS ralis_processes_deleted,
    rr.role_id as ralis_roles_id,
    rr.name as ralis_roles_name,
    rr.parameters as ralis_roles_parameter,
    rr.email as ralis_roles_email
FROM ralis_applications ra
left join ralis_users ru on ra.user_id = ru.user_id
left join ralis_categories rc on ra.category_id = rc.category_id 
left join ralis_processes rp on ra.status = rp.process_id AND ra.category_id = rp.category_id
left join ralis_roles rr on rr.role_id = ru.role_id
